TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ContextUtil extends System.Object

summary.span: 获取有关 COM+ 对象上下文的信息。

span.span: Obtains information about the COM+ object context.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是首选的类，用于获取 COM + 上下文信息。 is the preferred class to use for obtaining COM+ context information. 因为此类的成员是所有`static`(`shared`在 Visual Basic 中)，不需要使用它们之前对其实例化。Because the members of this class are all `static` (`shared` in Visual Basic), it is not necessary to instantiate it before using them. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用创建一个事务性。The following code example demonstrates how to use to create a transactional . [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices_Transaction#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Transaction/CPP/transaction.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServices_Transaction#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Transaction/CS/transaction.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServices_Transaction#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Transaction/VB/transaction.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 COM+ 上下文中的 位。

span.span: Gets or sets the bit in the COM+ context.

value.span: 如果该方法返回时将停用此对象，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the object is to be deactivated when the method returns; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks COM +`done`位确定多长时间对象保持活动状态在完成其工作后，可能会影响事务的持续时间。The COM+ `done` bit determines how long the object remains active after finishing its work and can affect the duration of a transaction. 当方法调用返回时，COM + 检查`done`位。When a method call returns, COM+ inspects the `done` bit. 如果`done`位是`true`，COM + 停用该对象。If the `done` bit is `true`, COM+ deactivates the object. 如果`done`位是`false`，未停用该对象。If the `done` bit is `false`, the object is not deactivated. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性以确保方法调用后停用。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property to ensure that a is deactivated after a method call. [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices_Transaction#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Transaction/CPP/transaction.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServices_Transaction#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Transaction/CS/transaction.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServices_Transaction#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Transaction/VB/transaction.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如有需要，COM + 上下文决定中止当前事务，但在方法返回未停用该对象。If asked, the COM+ context votes to abort the current transaction, but the object is not deactivated on method return. ## Examples 下面的代码示例调用方法。The following code example calls the method. MemberSignature.Value: public static System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionVote MyTransactionVote { get; set; }
.property valuetype System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionVote MyTransactionVote
Public Shared Property MyTransactionVote As TransactionVote

public: static property System::EnterpriseServices::TransactionVote MyTransactionVote { System::EnterpriseServices::TransactionVote get(); void set(System::EnterpriseServices::TransactionVote value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 COM+ 上下文中的 位。

span.span: Gets or sets the bit in the COM+ context.
One of the values, either or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当设置为`Commit`，COM +`consistent`位设置为`true`和 COM + 上下文投票提交事务。When is set to `Commit`, the COM+ `consistent` bit is set to `true` and the COM+ context votes to commit the transaction. 如果设置为`Abort`、`consistent`位设置为`false`和 COM + 上下文投票中止事务。If is set to `Abort`, the `consistent` bit is set to `false` and the COM+ context votes to abort the transaction. 默认值`consistent`位是`true`。The default value of the `consistent` bit is `true`. `consistent`位将强制转换投票提交或中止它执行的事务和`done`位完成投票。The `consistent` bit casts a vote to commit or abort the transaction in which it executes, and the `done` bit finalizes the vote. COM + 检查`consistent`位时`done`位设置为`true`方法调用返回时或当对象的停用。COM+ inspects the `consistent` bit when the `done` bit is set to `true` on a method call return or when the object deactivates. 尽管对象的`consistent`位能够更改重复内每个方法调用，只有最后的更改的计数。Although an object's `consistent` bit can change repeatedly within each method call, only the last change counts. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来创建一个事务性。The following code example demonstrates how to use property to create a transactional . [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices_Transaction#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Transaction/CPP/transaction.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServices_Transaction#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Transaction/CS/transaction.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServices_Transaction#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Transaction/VB/transaction.vb#1)]
